original_text: They must say to the leaders, ‘This is our son. He refuses to obey us. He does not do what we tell him. He only wants to do what will please himself. He drinks too much and he becomes drunk.’
korean_text: 그 성읍 장로들에게 말하기를 우리의 이 자식은 완악하고 패역하여 우리 말을 듣지 아니하고 방탕하며 술에 잠긴 자라 하면

sentences.original_text: They must say to the leaders
He does not do what we tell him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리가 시키는 대로 하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: He only wants to do what will please himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 자신을 기쁘게 할 일만 하고 싶어 합니다
